author: jleroux
msg: A patch from Leon for "correct BIRT_VIEWER_SCRIPTLIB_DIR configuration" https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-5053
Birt has been move to specialpurpose but BIRT_VIEWER_SCRIPTLIB_DIR in web.xml is still configured to framework.
jleroux: while checking I found also an error in  birt/documents/Birt.xml and while at it I also commit a tiny part of OFBIZ-4941 in birt/ofbiz-component.xml because it breaks the help.
